 2018-08612018-06-21PS,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 212, British Columbia
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 212 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the provision of financial assistance to the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA, with respect to the severe spring floods and mudslides that occurred from May 4, 2017 until July July 29, 2017, which affected many communities.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
